title: Four persons P, Q, R, and S are sitting along the different sides of a table. Q is sitting towards the left of P, R who is facing West is sitting to the right of S. Who is facing South? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, we'll make some assumptions The table is aligned with the directions. All the four persons will be facing inwards, ie. Looking at the table. Now applying the given conditions I got this !  So in this case all conditions are satisfied - P, Q, R, S all are sitting along different edges. R facing West, sitting to the right of S Q is to the left of P So the answer is : Q is facing South Hope this helps you!
